txt.en:
'The abominations have been dealt with, and that is a very good thing. You are clearly a person to be trusted. We need the Elders to know, however, that the threat of Saruman is real.

'Return to Lhan Rhos and tell the Elders that the time for action is now. Explain to them what the abominations truly are, and maybe they will listen... although, I do not have much faith. Tell them that the time for Assembly is here, and we will stand with them.

'Go. Now!'

'I see. This is what I had most feared. I am thankful to you for relaying this information to me.\n\n'I am afraid that Blaire is right... we can no longer wait and hope for peace. I have need of you again, [placeholder].'
'You should return at once to the Elders at Lhan Rhos.'
Blaire is greatly worried about the presence of Saruman in the Dunbog and fears that the Avanc-lûth will be attacked shortly.
Talk to Elder Déin at Lhan Rhos
Elder Déin is at Lhan Rhos, south of the Boar-clan encampment.\n\nBlaire has asked you to talk to Elder Déin and call an assembly of the Avanc-lûth.
